value.serviceSlug: Expert cleaning for your home and office spaces.
value.serviceText: Hutchison Maintenance offers top-notch home and office cleaning services, ensuring a spotless and comfortable environment. With over 20 years of experience, our team of professionals is dedicated to providing exceptional results that exceed your expectations.

features.name: Residential Cleaning
features.description: Our residential cleaning services cover every corner of your home, leaving it spotless and inviting. We take care of everything from dusting and vacuuming to deep cleaning kitchens and bathrooms.

features.name: Commercial Cleaning
features.description: Hutchison Maintenance provides commercial cleaning services for offices, retail spaces, and other business establishments. Our team ensures a clean and organized workspace that promotes productivity and a professional atmosphere.

features.name: Customized Cleaning Plans
features.description: We understand that every home and office has unique cleaning needs. That's why we offer customized cleaning plans tailored to your specific requirements, ensuring a thorough and satisfactory result.

value.serviceSlug: Impress potential buyers with pristine property presentation.
value.serviceText: Hutchison Maintenance specializes in real estate cleaning services, helping real estate agents and property managers showcase properties at their best. Our meticulous cleaning ensures a spotless and inviting space that appeals to potential buyers and tenants.

features.name: Pre-Listing Cleaning
features.description: We provide thorough cleaning services before listing a property, ensuring it looks its best for photos and open houses. Our attention to detail helps create a positive impression on potential buyers.

features.name: Post-Construction Cleaning
features.description: After construction or renovation, we offer post-construction cleaning services to make your property shine. Our team removes dust, debris, and construction materials, leaving the space clean and ready for occupancy.

features.name: Property Management Cleaning
features.description: For property managers, we offer regular cleaning services to maintain the cleanliness and appeal of rental properties. Our team ensures a welcoming environment for new tenants and helps maintain the property's value.

value.serviceSlug: Crystal clear windows for a brighter view.
value.serviceText: Hutchison Maintenance offers professional window cleaning services for residential and commercial properties. Our team of experts ensures spotless windows that enhance the appearance of your property and allow natural light to fill your space.

features.name: Residential Window Cleaning
features.description: Our residential window cleaning services leave your home's windows sparkling clean, improving curb appeal and allowing more natural light into your living spaces.

features.name: Commercial Window Cleaning
features.description: For businesses, clean windows create a professional appearance and a welcoming environment for customers and employees. Our team provides expert window cleaning services for commercial properties of all sizes.

features.name: Safety and Efficiency
features.description: Our window cleaning professionals use safe and efficient techniques to clean your windows without causing any damage to your property. We prioritize safety and customer satisfaction in every job we undertake.

services.instructions: Write up to four services in a way that mimics the example schema

example.serviceBlurb: A short blurb about what the service is. Should be catchy and short.
example.serviceSlug: A slightly longer description of the service, but no more than 1 sentence.
example.serviceText: A more thorough description of the service. 1 paragraph.
example.imageUrl: A url to an image that represents the service a 1:1 aspect ratio
example.imageAlt: Alt text for the image. can be left blank

features.name: A 1st specific feature of the service
features.description: A 1 paragraph description of the service

features.name: A 2nd specific feature of the service
features.description: A 1 paragraph description of the service.

features.name: A 3rd specific feature of the service
features.description: A 1 paragraph description of the service.
